traits.name: Nimble
entries: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The acrobat makes two attacks with its barbed pole.

actions.name: Barbed Pole
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage, and the acrobat can jump up to 20 feet. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
